summary.para: Performs the Gaussian error function (erf) on each element of InputTensor, placing the result into the corresponding element of OutputTensor.
summary.code: f(x) = 2 / sqrt(pi) * integrate( i = 0 to x, exp(-(i^2)) )
summary.para: Where exp(x) is the natural exponentiation function.
This operator supports in-place execution, meaning that OutputTensor is permitted to alias InputTensor during binding.

member.name: DML_ELEMENT_WISE_ERF_OPERATOR_DESC.InputTensor
member.summary: The input tensor to read from.

member.name: DML_ELEMENT_WISE_ERF_OPERATOR_DESC.OutputTensor
member.summary: The output tensor to write the results to.

member.name: DML_ELEMENT_WISE_ERF_OPERATOR_DESC.ScaleBias
member.summary: An optional scale and bias to apply to the input. If present, this has the effect of applying the function g(x) = x * scale + bias to each input element prior to computing this operator.
